verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Ye shall be holy <WH6918>: for I the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> am holy <WH6918>.
Ye shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> every man <WH376> his mother <WH517>, and his father <WH1>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my sabbaths <WH7676>: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
Turn <WH6437> <WH8799> ye not unto idols <WH457>, nor make <WH6213> <WH8799> to yourselves molten <WH4541> 'elohim <WH430>: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
And if ye offer <WH2076> <WH8799> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> unto the YY <WH3068>, ye shall offer <WH2076> <WH8799> it at your own will <WH7522>.

It shall be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> the same day <WH3117> ye offer <WH2077> it, and on the morrow <WH4283>: and if ought remain <WH3498> <WH8737> until the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it shall be burnt <WH8313> <WH8735> in the fire <WH784>.
And if it be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> at all <WH398> <WH8736> on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, it is abominable <WH6292>; it shall not be accepted <WH7521> <WH8735>.

Therefore every one that eateth <WH398> <WH8802> it shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> his iniquity <WH5771>, because he hath profaned <WH2490> <WH8765> the hallowed thing <WH6944> of the YY <WH3068>: and that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8738> from among his people <WH5971>.

And when ye reap <WH7114> <WH8800> the harvest <WH7105> of your land <WH776>, thou shalt not wholly reap <WH3615> <WH8762> the corners <WH6285> of thy field <WH7704>, neither shalt thou gather <WH3950> <WH8762> the gleanings <WH3951> of thy harvest <WH7105>.

And thou shalt not glean <WH5953> <WH8779> thy vineyard <WH3754>, neither shalt thou gather <WH3950> <WH8762> every grape <WH6528> of thy vineyard <WH3754>; thou shalt leave <WH5800> <WH8799> them for the poor <WH6041> and stranger <WH1616>: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
Ye shall not steal <WH1589> <WH8799>, neither deal falsely <WH3584> <WH8762>, neither lie <WH8266> <WH8762> one <WH376> to another <WH5997>.
And ye shall not swear <WH7650> <WH8735> by my name <WH8034> falsely <WH8267>, neither shalt thou profane <WH2490> <WH8765> the name <WH8034> of thy 'Elohim <WH430>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Thou shalt not defraud <WH6231> <WH8799> thy neighbour <WH7453>, neither rob <WH1497> <WH8799> him: the wages <WH6468> of him that is hired <WH7916> shall not abide <WH3885> <WH8799> with thee all night until the morning <WH1242>.

Thou shalt not curse <WH7043> <WH8762> the deaf <WH2795>, nor put <WH5414> <WH8799> a stumblingblock <WH4383> before <WH6440> the blind <WH5787>, but shalt fear <WH3372> <WH8804> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> no unrighteousness <WH5766> in judgment <WH4941>: thou shalt not respect <WH5375> <WH8799> the person <WH6440> of the poor <WH1800>, nor honour <WH1921> <WH8799> the person <WH6440> of the mighty <WH1419>: but in righteousness <WH6664> shalt thou judge <WH8199> <WH8799> thy neighbour <WH5997>.

Thou shalt not go <WH3212> <WH8799> up and down as a talebearer <WH7400> among thy people <WH5971>: neither shalt thou stand <WH5975> <WH8799> against the blood <WH1818> of thy neighbour <WH7453>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Thou shalt not hate <WH8130> <WH8799> thy brother <WH251> in thine heart <WH3824>: thou shalt in any wise <WH3198> <WH8687> rebuke <WH3198> <WH8686> thy neighbour <WH5997>, and not suffer <WH5375> <WH8799> sin <WH2399> upon him.

Thou shalt not avenge <WH5358> <WH8799>, nor bear any grudge <WH5201> <WH8799> against the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>, but thou shalt love <WH157> <WH8804> thy neighbour <WH7453> as thyself <WH3644>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my statutes <WH2708>. Thou shalt not let thy cattle <WH929> gender <WH7250> <WH8686> with a diverse kind <WH3610>: thou shalt not sow <WH2232> <WH8799> thy field <WH7704> with mingled seed <WH3610>: neither shall a garment <WH899> mingled <WH3610> of linen and woollen <WH8162> come <WH5927> <WH8799> upon thee.

And whosoever <WH376> lieth <WH7901> <WH8799> carnally <WH2233> <WH7902> with a woman <WH802>, that is a bondmaid <WH8198>, betrothed <WH2778> <WH8737> to an husband <WH376>, and not at all <WH6299> <WH8715> redeemed <WH6299> <WH8738>, nor freedom <WH2668> given <WH5414> <WH8738> her; she shall be scourged <WH1244>; they shall not be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>, because she was not free <WH2666> <WH8795>.

And he shall bring <WH935> <WH8689> his trespass offering <WH817> unto the YY <WH3068>, unto the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, even a ram <WH352> for a trespass offering <WH817>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8765> for him with the ram <WH352> of the trespass offering <WH817> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> for his sin <WH2403> which he hath done <WH2398> <WH8804>: and the sin <WH2403> which he hath done <WH2398> <WH8804> shall be forgiven <WH5545> <WH8738> him.

And when ye shall come <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776>, and shall have planted <WH5193> <WH8804> all manner of trees <WH6086> for food <WH3978>, then ye shall count <WH6188> the fruit <WH6529> thereof as uncircumcised <WH6188> <WH8804> <WH6190>: three <WH7969> years <WH8141> shall it be as uncircumcised <WH6189> unto you: it shall not be eaten <WH398> <WH8735> of.
But in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> all the fruit <WH6529> thereof shall be holy <WH6944> to praise <WH1974> the YY <WH3068> withal.

And in the fifth <WH2549> year <WH8141> shall ye eat <WH398> <WH8799> of the fruit <WH6529> thereof, that it may yield <WH3254> <WH8687> unto you the increase <WH8393> thereof: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
Ye shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> any thing with the blood <WH1818>: neither shall ye use enchantment <WH5172> <WH8762>, nor observe times <WH6049> <WH8779>.
Ye shall not round <WH5362> <WH8686> the corners <WH6285> of your heads <WH7218>, neither shalt thou mar <WH7843> <WH8686> the corners <WH6285> of thy beard <WH2206>.
Ye shall not make <WH5414> <WH8799> any <WH3793> cuttings <WH8296> in your flesh <WH1320> for the dead <WH5315>, nor print <WH5414> <WH8799> any marks <WH7085> upon you: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Do not prostitute <WH2490> <WH8762> thy daughter <WH1323>, to cause her to be a whore <WH2181> <WH8687>; lest the land <WH776> fall to whoredom <WH2181> <WH8799>, and the land <WH776> become full <WH4390> <WH8804> of wickedness <WH2154>.
Ye shall keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my sabbaths <WH7676>, and reverence <WH3372> <WH8799> my sanctuary <WH4720>: I am the YY <WH3068>.

Regard <WH6437> <WH8799> not them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, neither seek <WH1245> <WH8762> after wizards <WH3049>, to be defiled <WH2930> <WH8800> by them: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

Thou shalt rise up <WH6965> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the hoary head <WH7872>, and honour <WH1921> <WH8804> the face <WH6440> of the old man <WH2205>, and fear <WH3372> <WH8804> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: I am the YY <WH3068>.
And if a stranger <WH1616> sojourn <WH1481> <WH8799> with thee in your land <WH776>, ye shall not vex <WH3238> <WH8686> him.

But the stranger <WH1616> that dwelleth <WH1481> <WH8802> with you shall be unto you as one born <WH249> among you, and thou shalt love <WH157> <WH8804> him as thyself; for ye were strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
Ye shall do <WH6213> <WH8799> no unrighteousness <WH5766> in judgment <WH4941>, in meteyard <WH4060>, in weight <WH4948>, or in measure <WH4884>.

Just <WH6664> balances <WH3976>, just <WH6664> weights <WH68>, a just <WH6664> ephah <WH374>, and a just <WH6664> hin <WH1969>, shall ye have: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, which brought you out <WH3318> <WH8689> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
Therefore shall ye observe <WH8104> <WH8804> all my statutes <WH2708>, and all my judgments <WH4941>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them: I am the YY <WH3068>.
